messages.title: THE STRONG VOICE FOR US
messages.content: Fighting against Hard Brexit, Standing up for the NHS, Opposing school cuts

messages.title: THIS IS OUR CHANCE FOR CHANGE
messages.content: The Conservative Party is now the party of extreme hard Brexit. Theresa May is determined to pull Britain out of the single market and cut all ties with our neighbours. Labour are too weak and divided to oppose the conservatives. Only Tim Farron's Liberal Democrats are speaking up for everyone in Brentwood & Ongar who wants to stop a hard Brexit.

messages.title: Only Karen Chilvers and the Lib Dems are fighting to give you the final say on the Brexit deal.
Help Karen Chilvers stop a hard Brexit
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are leading the campaign against the conservatives' damaging, Tory-led Brexit with Brentwood & Ongar at the forefront. Only Karen Chilvers will give you the final say - with the option to stay in the European Union. Sign up below to back the Liberal Democrat campaign.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union, and that's why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
Only the Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds it needs by raising a penny on income tax to provide an additional £6 billion for health and care services.
Local schools are under threat from Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Brentwood & Ongar. Schools in Essex are set to lose £7.7 million from their budgets.

issues.brexitEurope: Fighting against Hard Brexit. The Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union, and that's why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.

contactInformation.address: Return House, Doddinghurst Road, Doddinghurst, Brentwood, Essex, CM15 0SJ

quotes.text: Britain to leave Single Market, says Theresa May
Corbyn to order Labour MPs to vote for Article 50.
The Conservatives are dragging us out of the Single Market.
Jeremy Corbyn's Labour are backing the Conservative plan.
